About Me

Hey! I’m excited to see you here and without wasting any time let me tell you something about me. My name is Nisar Ahmed. I’m a different person to different people, annoying to one, talented to other, boring for one, interesting to another, quiet to one, unknown to a lot, maybe ugly for you but lovely for my friends and sweet for parents. yet to figure out, who am I to me.
I’m currently a final year student of CSE at Vivekananda Global University. You know what, I have a lot of things still left to tell you. How about contacting me?
